Name: KingSword
Description: Doubles strikes dealt. Grants +10 Hit/Avoid to allies  within 3 tiles while equipped.

Name: ParagonSword
Description: Def +5. Doubles  combat experience gained while equipped.

Name: WindSword
Description: Casts magical wind. Spd +5. Effective against fliers.

Name: SleepSword
Description: Puts enemies to sleep for one turn if it hits.

Name: BerserkSword
Description: Drives enemies mad for one turn if it hits.

Name: MasterBow
Description: Doubles strikes dealt. Effective against fliers.

Name: KillerBow
Description: Improves critical hit rate. Effective against fliers.

Name: BraveBow
Description: Doubles strikes dealt. Effective against fliers.

Name: LongArch
Description: Ballista only. Long-range weapon. Effective against fliers.

Name: IronArch
Description: Ballista only. Super long-range weapon. Effective against fliers.

Name: KillerArch
Description: Ballista only. Long-range weapon that improves critical hit rate. Effective against fliers.

Name: Blizzard
Description: Long-range storm. Puts enemy to sleep.

Name: Again
Description: Allow an ally to move again.

Name: Sigil
Description: Creates a light rune that blocks off paths.

Name: Heal
Description: Restores HP to an adjacent ally.

Name: Mend
Description: Restores a large amount of HP to an adjacent ally.

Name: Maharaghi
Description: Zhara only. Can be used to restore all HP to an adjacent ally.

Name: Physic
Description: Restores HP to an ally at a distance.

Name: Fortify
Description: Restores HP to all allies in range.

Name: Silence
Description: Prevents target from using magic for a turn.

Name: Sleep
Description: Puts target to sleep for a turn.

Name: Warp
Description: Teleports adjacent ally to a distance.

Name: Rescue
Description: Teleports distant ally to be adjacent to caster.

Name: TorchStaff
Description: Lights an area. The light grows weaker each turn.

Name: Hammerne
Description: Repairs an adjacent ally's weapon to new condition.

Name: Unlock
Description: Opens doors and chests at range.

Name: Barrier
Description: Increases resistance of adjacent ally, decays each turn.

Name: AngelicRobe
Description: Increases HP by 3 points when used.

Name: EnergyRing
Description: Increases Strength by 1 point when used.

Name: SecretBook
Description: Increases Skill by 2 points when used.

Name: Speedwings
Description: Increases Speed by 1 point when used.

Name: GoddessIcon
Description: Increases Luck by 2 points when used.

Name: Dragonshield
Description: Increases Defense by 1 point when used.

Name: Talisman
Description: Increases Resistance by 2 points when used.

Name: Boots
Description: Increases Move by 1 point when used.

Name: Swiftsoles
Description: Increases Move by 1 point when used.

Name: BodyRing
Description: Increases Build by 1 point when used.

Name: SlimBow
Description: A lightweight bow. Effective against fliers.

Name: DevilsDagger
Description: Mish only. Ignores user's Str and enemy's Def. 21-Luck% chance of backfire.

Name: BalladOfWar
Description: Cadenza only. +10 Hit/Avoid to allies within 3 tiles.

Name: Muramasa
Description: Carl only. Increases critical hit rate.

Name: Vulnerary
Description: Heals user for 15 HP when used.

Name: Elixir

Name: PureWater
Description: Grants +7 Res when used, which decays each turn.

Name: SpiritDust
Description: Increases Mag by 1 point when used.

Name: Torch
Description: Grants increased fog vision to unit, which decays each turn.

Name: Thief
Description: Can steal an item from target if user's Mag > target's Res.

Name: MemberCard
Description: Grants access to secret shops while in inventory.

Name: WhiteGem
Description: A valuable gemstone that sells for 5,000 gold.

Name: BlueGem
Description: A rare gemstone that sells for 2,000 gold.

Name: RedGem
Description: An uncommon gemstone that sells for 1,000 gold.

Name: Kaiserschwert
Description: Loewe only. Follow-up attacks strike consecutively.

Name: LightRune
Description: Use to create a light rune that blocks off paths.

Name: TemperedRing
Description: Restores 4 HP after combat while equipped.

Name: Lumen
Description: Matthias only. Can be used to illuminate.

Name: KnightProof
Description: Can be used to promote units Lv. 10 and up.

Description: Magic weapon. +5 Speed. Effective against fliers.

Description: Ballista only. Mid-long-range weapon. Effective against fliers.

Name: Stinger
Description: Hornet only. +5 Speed. Effective against fliers.

Name: Daybreak
Description: The night sky will not hide you. Effective against fliers.

Name: Crusher

Name: Stormbreaker
Description: Apsis only. Adds 15 Hit/Crit if at max range, and +30 if also moved full move.

Name: AbsoluteZero
Description: Apsis only. Penalizes -2 Atk/AS to foes in 2 spaces, -6 if user is on terrain.

Name: EyeofDawn
Description: Apsis only. Adds Str to damage dealt, and restores HP equal to damage dealt.

Name: FaithsWind

Name: DancingBlade

Name: RuneArrow
Description: Tao only. Adds Mag to Crit while equipped.

Name: BlackAnklet

Name: Boltbrand

Name: Impaler

Name: Nibiru

Name: RaioScroll

Name: CherneScroll

Name: DreedurScroll
Description: While equipped, +20% Mag/Res, +5% Str/Skl, -5% HP, -10% Def growths.

Name: WornScroll

Name: AmserScroll
Description: While equipped, +10% Mov growth, -15% Def/Res growths.

Description: Rashid only. Effective against fliers and Archers/Snipers.

Name: WoodlandsHuke
